          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Hur ofta? Hur länge? 1</string>
            <string language="en">How often? How long? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie häufig? Wie sehnen Sie sich? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien de fois ? Combien de temps ? 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como frequentemente? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni quanto tempo? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο συχνά; Πόσο καιρό πολύ; 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo a menudo? ¿Cuanto tiempo? 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En övning där man tränar på olika sätt att uttrycka tid.Modul 5 - Vem är du? - Fritid.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">An exercise where one accustoms in various way to express time.

Module 5 - who is you? - spare time.

Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Übung, in der man in der verschiedenen 
Methode, time.Module 5 auszudrücken sich gewöhnt - wer ist Sie? 
- Ersatztime.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice où on s'accoutume de la diverse voie
d'exprimer time.Module 5 - qui est vous ? - time.Safir 
disponible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício onde se se acostume na vária 
maneira expressar time.Module 5 - quem é você? - time.Safir de
reposição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione dove si accustoms in vario modo 
esprimere time.Module 5 - chi è voi? - time.Safir di ricambio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση όπου accustoms ένα με το διάφορο τρόπο 
να εκφραστεί η χρονική ενότητα 5 - ποιος είναι εσύ; - 
ελεύθερος χρόνος Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Un ejercicio donde uno se acostumbra de varia 
manera de expresar time.Module 5 - quién es usted? - time.Safir
de repuesto.</string>
          </description>
